PHRASE.LANG: Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-MGX8 Personal Mini-gun is a multi-barreled chain-gun firing 5mm ammunition at over 5,000 shots per minute. Fitted to a specialized harness and personal armor vest, the D2O-MGX8 is standard issue to CAS foot patrol units. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]

Développé et fabriqué par la division des Armes spéciales de la D2O. Le mini-canon personnel D2O-MGX8 est un chaingun à plusieurs canons tirant plus de 5000 munitions de 5mm à la minute. Adapté à un harnais spécial et à une veste renforcée, le D2O-MGX8 est l'équipement standard des unités de patrouille à pied du CAS. Cette arme ne convient qu'aux agents hommes.[#Legal]

Developed and manufactured by the D2O Special Weapons Division. The D2O-MGX8 Personal Mini-gun is a multi-barreled chain-gun firing 5mm ammunition at over 5,000 shots per minute. Fitted to a specialized harness and personal armor vest, the D2O-MGX8 is standard issue to CAS foot patrol units. This weapon can only be fitted for male personnel.[#Legal]
